data.name: Voltage Demo
data.detailed_description:
Not sure about a game? Try out a demo before you buy!


Releasing a free demo for VOLTAGE, available to download for all PC Steam users. To download the demo, simply head on over to the Voltage Steam page and click the “Download PC Demo” button on the right.

You’ll have the option to play interesting desert-mission with full of action! You'll also have an option to play demo version of the Voltage Super Retro. There is no limit to how many times you can play the demo.
data.about_the_game:
Not sure about a game? Try out a demo before you buy!


Releasing a free demo for VOLTAGE, available to download for all PC Steam users. To download the demo, simply head on over to the Voltage Steam page and click the “Download PC Demo” button on the right.

You’ll have the option to play interesting desert-mission with full of action! You'll also have an option to play demo version of the Voltage Super Retro. There is no limit to how many times you can play the demo.
data.short_description: Releasing a free demo for VOLTAGE, available to download for all PC Steam users! Set in the town of Frontier, Missouri, in the 1980s, young man called Mark finds a prototype of VR-glasses. And to his surprise, the glasses are compatible with his Amiga 500. He launches a game and step in to an incredible adventure...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 or 10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: You might be able to play the game partly with controller too, but currently mouse and keyboard works the best.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 or 10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660 or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
